```{r}
library(readr)
team <- read_csv("~/Documents/Intro to Data Science/Teams_Cleaned.csv")
summary(team)
team <- team[!(is.na(team$World_Series_Winner) | team$World_Series_Winner==""), ]

```

```{r}
team$World_Series_Winner <- factor(team$World_Series_Winner)

teamLog <- glm(World_Series_Winner ~ Runs_scored + Hits + Homeruns, data = team, family = "binomial")

summary(teamLog)

exp(coef(teamLog))

```
